computing_environment:
Linux (Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server release 6.4)
Mac OS X (darwin x86_64 m64)
data_usage: The multi-model mean difference in average annual temperature under the higher emissions scenario (A2) for 2041-2070 relative to 1971-2000 was plotted for the contiguous United States.
methodology:
1. For each model at each grid point, the average annual temperature under the higher emissions scenario (A2) was calculated for two periods: 1971-2000 and 2041-2070.
2. At each grid point, the average annual temperature for the two time periods was computed by averaging the following models:
- cgcm3_t47
- cgcm3_t63
- cnrm
- echam5
- echo
- gfdl_2.1
- hadcm3
- pcm
3. At each grid point, the difference in average annual temperature was calculated for 2041-2070 minus 1971-2000.
4. Data were plotted for all grid points in the midwestern United States.
